0000001.name: Resources mentioned in "Sharing biological data: why, when, and how"
0000001.description: These resources were listed in "Sharing biological data: why, when, and how", which prompted further novel curation of the Bioregsitry which included the addition og GenBank, Panorama Public, EMPIAR, and SSBD. It also prompted the curation of mappings to FAIRSharing when possible.
